original_text: Up! Lift up the boy, and hold him fast with your hand, for I will make him into a great nation.”
korean_text: 일어나 아이를 일으켜 네 손으로 붙들라 그가 큰 민족을 이루게 하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: and hold him fast with your hand
for I will make him into a great nation
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 큰 민족으로 만들 것이니라
